meanings.sent1: The candlelighters carefully lit the candles for the birthday cake.
meanings.sent2: She is known as the candlelighter in our family because she loves lighting candles.
meanings.sent3: The candlelighters had a race to see who could light the candles the fastest.
meanings.sent4: As the candlelighter of the group, he brought light to every dark corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The candlelighters' job is to bring warmth and light to every celebration.

meanings.definition: An organization that raises funds for cancer research.
meanings.sent1: The candlelighters organized a charity event to raise money for cancer research.
meanings.sent2: I donated to the candlelighters to support their cause in finding a cure for cancer.
meanings.sent3: The candlelighters' bake sale was a hit, raising funds in a delicious way.
meanings.sent4: The candlelighters' dedication to their cause shines brighter than any candle.
meanings.sent5: Joining the candlelighters is a way to make a difference in the fight against cancer.

meanings.definition: A tool used to light candles.
meanings.sent1: She used the candlelighter to safely light the candles on the dinner table.
meanings.sent2: The candlelighter made it easy to reach the candles in the center of the room.
meanings.sent3: The candlelighter was so fancy, it felt like a magic wand for candles.
meanings.sent4: With the candlelighter in hand, she brought light to every dark corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The candlelighter's flame danced as it lit up the room with a warm glow.
